title: Burrito Beach and B Smooth
typeOfFood: American, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Two restaurant concepts in one, located in the food court in Terminal 3 at O'Hare Airport. The first, Burrito Beach, serves tacos, burritos, fajitas, and has a vegan chili with quinoa. The 2nd restaurant, B Smooth, offers smoothies and custom-made salads; has soy milk for smoothies.
streetAddress: O'Hare International Airport, Terminal 3, Concourse K/H food court
